name: LivinupRVPremium
0:
”Alexa, turn on dresser light.”
”Alexa, turn on bedroom.”
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Overhead.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa for control your caravan lighting such as kitchen light, bathroom light, awning LED...etc. When you sleepy, just ask Alexa to turn off all light. you won't standup to find wall switch. just ask Alexa!
1. Bathroom
2. Bedroom
3. Dresser
4. Annex
5. Awning LED
6. Bedroom Overhead
7. Kitchen
8. Kitchen Overhead
9. Dinette
10. Feature
11. Dinette Overhead
12. Entrance

The skill need to work with Livinup MiWAY-WiFi and 12 ch light controller. Please visit https://www.livinup.com.tw for more detail information. 

Get started by letting alexa access your caravan lighting. Please see the back side label of MiWAY-WiFi. You can find the access account and password on the label. Once you enable the skill and finish the account link. You can enjoy the voice control life.
